hero.description: A comprehensive collection of free SEO, analytics, and intelligence tools to help you optimize your digital presence.

tools.name: Link Counter Tool
tools.description: Use our link counter to easily check link counts and understand internal and external links with a simple and clear counter link tool.

tools.name: Keyword Density Checker Tool
tools.description: Use a keyword density checker to check keyword density easily and improve content balance with a simple and clear tool.

tools.name: Domain Authority Checker Tool
tools.description: Check domain authority instantly using our domain authority checker free tool powered by Moz metrics.

tools.name: AI Content Detector Tool
tools.description: Accurately detect AI-generated text from ChatGPT, GPT-4, Claude, and Gemini with our advanced AI checking tool.

tools.name: Plagiarism Checker Tool
tools.description: Use our plagiarism checker to detect duplicate content and ensure originality with a simple, fast, and accurate plagiarism detector.

tools.name: Backlink Analyzer
tools.description: Analyze backlinks for any domain.

tools.name: Bulk URL Opener Tool
tools.description: Open multiple URLs simultaneously in new tabs to boost productivity.

tools.name: Readability Checker Tool
tools.description: Analyze your text complexity with multiple proven readability formulas in one place.

tools.name: Flesch Reading Ease Calculator
tools.description: Measure how easy your content is to read on a scale of 0-100.

tools.name: Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level Calculator
tools.description: Find out the education level needed to understand your writing.

tools.name: Gunning Fog Index Calculator
tools.description: Estimate the years of formal education required to read your text.

tools.name: SMOG Index Calculator
tools.description: A gold standard for healthcare and technical readability.

tools.name: Automated Readability Index (ARI)
tools.description: Determine the grade level needed to comprehend your text.

tools.name: Coleman-Liau Index Calculator
tools.description: A readability formula that relies on characters instead of syllables.

tools.name: Dale-Chall Readability Calculator
tools.description: Measures difficulty based on a list of 3,000 familiar words.

tools.name: LIX Readability Calculator
tools.description: A simple readability measure suitable for many languages.

tools.name: RIX Readability Calculator
tools.description: A simplified complexity ratio based on long words per sentence.

tools.name: SEO ROI Calculator
tools.description: Calculate your monthly SEO return on investment and measure the financial impact of your search optimization efforts.

tools.name: Enterprise SEO ROI Calculator
tools.description: Calculate your SEO return on investment and measure the true impact of your enterprise SEO campaigns.

tools.name: Conversion Rate Calculator Tool
tools.description: Calculate conversion rates for websites, sales, and retail stores to track success.

tools.name: Password Generator Tool
tools.description: Use our password generator free tool to generate password safely with a random password generator for strong and secure access.

tools.name: DNS Lookup Tool
tools.description: Use our DNS lookup tool to find DNS records easily and perform quick dns server lookup with clear and accurate results.

tools.name: CNAME Checker Tool
tools.description: Check Canonical Name (CNAME) records to verify domain aliases and forwarding configurations.

tools.name: MX Lookup Tool
tools.description: Use our MX lookup tool to lookup MX records easily and check email server settings with accurate and clear MX record data.

tools.name: SPF Record Lookup
tools.description: Check SPF records to improve email deliverability.

tools.name: NS Lookup Tool
tools.description: Find the authoritative name servers for any domain with our fast and reliable NS lookup tool.

tools.name: TXT Records Checker Tool
tools.description: Instantly retrieve and verify all DNS TXT records associated with a domain.

tools.name: SSL Certificate Lookup
tools.description: Check SSL certificate details, validity, and chain status for any domain.

tools.name: SSL Details Lookup
tools.description: Deep dive into SSL certificates.

tools.name: IP Address Lookup Tool
tools.description: Use our IP address lookup to find IP location details quickly with a simple ip lookup tool and clear, accurate results.

tools.name: IP Geolocation
tools.description: Find the geographical location of an IP address.

tools.name: IP Intelligence Tool
tools.description: Analyze any IP address for location, network, and security threats.
